verses.verse: You <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> when you <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1484>heathen,<s%> you were led <S%G71>away<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G880>mute<s%> <S%G1497>idols,<s%> <S%G5613%G99999>however<s%> you might be <S%G520>led.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> I <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G2424>"Jesus<s%> is <S%G331>accursed.<s%>" <S%G2532><s%> No <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G2424>"Jesus<s%> is <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>" <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> each <S%G1538>one<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> the <S%G5321>manifestation<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> for the profit of <S%G4851>all.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> to <S%G3739%G99999>one<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G1161>wisdom,<s%> and to <S%G243>another<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%>

and <S%G1161>to<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G1755>workings<s%> of <S%G1411>miracles;<s%> and <S%G1161>to<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy;<s%> and <S%G1161>to<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G1253>discerning<s%> of <S%G4151>spirits;<s%> <S%G1161>to<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> different <S%G1085>kinds<s%> of <S%G1100>languages;<s%> and <S%G1161>to<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> the <S%G2058>interpretation<s%> of <S%G1100>languages.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1754>works<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of <S%G5023>these,<s%> <S%G1244>distributing<s%> to each <S%G1538>one<s%> <S%G2398>separately<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G1014>desires.<s%>

<S%G1437>If<s%> the <S%G4228>foot<s%> would <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G3754>"Because<s%> <S%G1510>I<s%>'m <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G1510>I<s%>'m <S%G3756>not<s%> part <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%>" <S%G5124>it<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3844>therefore<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> part <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> the <S%G3775>ear<s%> would <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G3754>"Because<s%> <S%G1510>I<s%>'m <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3788>eye,<s%> <S%G1510>I<s%>'m <S%G3756>not<s%> part <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%>" <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5124>it<s%>'s <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3844>therefore<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> part <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> were an <S%G3788>eye,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> would the <S%G189>hearing<s%> <S%G1487>be?<s%> If the <S%G3650>whole<s%> were <S%G189>hearing,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> would the smelling <S%G3750>be?<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3788>eye<s%> <S%G1410>can't<s%> <S%G3756><s%> tell the <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G3756>"I<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> for <S%G4675>you,<s%>" <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> to the <S%G4228>feet,<s%> "I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> for <S%G5216>you.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>Those<s%> parts of the <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G1380>think<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> less <S%G820>honorable,<s%> on <S%G5125>those<s%> we <S%G4060>bestow<s%> more <S%G4053>abundant<s%> <S%G5092>honor;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G809>unpresentable<s%> parts <S%G2192>have<s%> more <S%G4053>abundant<s%> <S%G2157>propriety;<s%>

<S%G1161>whereas<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2158>presentable<s%> parts <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> such <S%G5532>need.<s%> <S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4786>composed<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G4786>together,<s%> <S%G1325>giving<s%> more <S%G4053>abundant<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> to the <S%G5302>inferior<s%> <S%G3588>part,<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> there should <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4978>division<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> that the <S%G3196>members<s%> should <S%G3309>have<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3309>care<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1535>When<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3196>member<s%> <S%G3958>suffers,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> suffer with <S%G4841>it.<s%> <S%G1535>Or<s%> when <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3196>member<s%> is <S%G1392>honored,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> rejoice with <S%G4796>it.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G5087>set<s%> <S%G3739%G99999>some<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly:<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G1320>teachers,<s%> <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G1411>miracle<s%> <S%G1534>workers,<s%> then <S%G5486>gifts<s%> of <S%G2386>healings,<s%> <S%G484>helps,<s%> <S%G2941>governments,<s%> and <S%G1085>various<s%> kinds of <S%G1100>languages.<s%>
